0.Name: Binds Familiar
0.Description: A small, intelligent creature is your companion.

1.Name: Brews Poisons
1.Description: You can prepare poisons each day to use with your attacks.

2.Name: Channels Godmind
2.Description: Through force of will and a connection to a higher intelligence, you gain power.

3.Name: Charms Animal
3.Description: A large, powerful animal is your companion.

4.Name: Conjures Fiends
4.Description: You can summon and control infernal beings.

5.Name: Dabbles in Commanding
5.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Commander class, or if you already have a secondary class.

6.Name: Dabbles in Exemplary Combat
6.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Exemplar class, or if you already have a secondary class.
6.Associated Discipline: Rapier’s Point OR Blades in the Dark

7.Name: Dabbles in Guarding
7.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Guardian class, or if you already have a secondary class.

8.Name: Dabbles in Harlequinry
8.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Harlequin class, or if you already have a secondary class.

9.Name: Dabbles in Mageblading
9.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Mageblade class, or if you already have a secondary class.

10.Name: Dabbles in Priesthood
10.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Priest class, or if you already have a secondary class.

11.Name: Dabbles in Reaping
11.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Reaper class, or if you already have a secondary class.

12.Name: Dabbles in Sylvanry
12.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Sylvan class, or if you already have a secondary class.
12.Associated Discipline: Red in Tooth and Claw OR Strong Bidding OR Frontline Fighting

13.Name: Dabbles in Wizardry
13.Requirements: You cannot take this kit if you belong to the Magician class, or if you already have a secondary class.
13.Associated Discipline: Spells of Ice and Fire OR Cup of Brimstone OR Puppeteer’s String

14.Name: Eats Monster Hearts
14.Description: You can replace your powers with those of monsters you defeat.

16.Name: Embodies Intelligence
16.Description: You are instinctively clever, able to appraise a situation quickly.

17.Name: Embodies Speed
17.Description: You are quick and agile, mobile whatever the terrain.

18.Name: Embodies Strength
18.Description: You are a pillar of strength, tough and powerful.

19.Name: Sculpts Their Body
19.Description: You can manipulate your own form – stretching, shaping and warping it as you need.

20.Name: Takes Bestial Form
20.Description: You can turn into a fearsome animal, and fight in that form.

21.Name: Worships the God of Life
21.Description: You worship a god devoted to life and healing, and gain their blessings.

22.Name: Worships the God of Peace
22.Description: You worship a god devoted to peace and protection, and gain their blessings.

23.Name: Worships the God of Tyranny
23.Description: You worship a god devoted to domination and pain, and gain their blessings.

24.Name: Worships the God of War
24.Description: You worship a god devoted to conflict and combat, and gain their blessings.
